response.original_title: Ann Peebles - I Can't Stand the Rain
response.overview: Ann Peebles was the reigning queen of soul at Memphis-based Hi Records in the 1970s, crafting some of the most unforgettable and enduring soul standards of the decade. This release captures Peebles in a 1996 concert at Belgium's Lokerse Feesten music festival and includes stellar live performances of such classics as "I Can't Stand the Rain" and "St. Louis Woman (With a Memphis Melody)."
response.title: Ann Peebles - I Can't Stand the Rain
